Development Senior Manager - SAP Solutions Manager CIS - Focused Build/Insights
Job

Apply now 

Date: 
Date:  May 12, 2020
City:
City: Bangalore, KA, IN
Company: 
Company:  SAP
Requisition ID:252354
Work Area: Software-Design and Development
Expected Travel: 0 - 10%
Career Status: Executive
Employment Type: Regular Full Time
 
COMPANY DESCRIPTION
 
SAP started in 1972 as a team of five colleagues with a desire to do something new. Together, they changed enterprise software and
reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. That’s why
we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and
cultures.
SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse
and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries,
grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and
improve people’s lives.
 
Purpose and Objective of Job
 
As the market leader of ERP software, SAP Product Engineering Group provides a complete portfolio of maintenance offerings and a
comprehensive range of services that enable customers to continually improve core business processes while leveraging their existing
solutions. The SAP Solution Manager is a service platform, which is designed to assist customers to implementing and operating their IT
solutions efficiently to increase the reliability and lower the cost of ownership. This product provides the tools, the integrated content, and
the gateway to SAP that you need to implement, operate, and monitor your SAP centric solutions and hybrid solutions, thereby
accelerating the transition phase to Intelligent Enterprise. Continuous Innovation Services team is responsible for the innovation and

 stabilization of SAP Solution Manager, which is the premier platform for the on-Premise customer installed base and partners, where we
will deliver continuous innovation until at least 2027 and beyond.
 
Focused Build for SAP Solution Manager is a ready-to-run and integrated, tool-supported methodology to manage requirements and
software development in large, agile projects. It is based on pre-configured standard SAP Solution Manager features and processes, as
well as additional build functions.
 
Focused Insights for SAP Solution Manager unifies, aggregates and correlates all SAP Solution Manager’s metrics in single
comprehensive views.
It offers standard dashboards supporting all SAP ALM scenarios for RunSAP and BuildSAP. By delivering the most relevant and valuable
information to the right people in real time, Focused Insights helps SAP IT departments to build and distribute powerful dashboards
tailored to all SAP IT users (operators, basis teams, application managers, CIO, …).
 
 
Expectations and Tasks
 
You will be building up and managing a development team ranking from early talents to experienced experts with the goal of delivering
world class continuous innovation to our products and services. Your areas of responsibility will be our Focused Solutions (Focused Build
and Focus Insights). This requires a deep understanding of customers challenges in the area of application lifecycle management and a
profound understanding of the processes from requirement to deploy.
Preferred candidates will have a proven record of exceptional customer focus, being open-minded and flexible to manage a team in a
highly diverse organization.
Therefore Honesty, Accountability, Integrity, Empathy, and Respectfulness should be part of your DNA.
 
Tasks include:
 

Set direction by building your team’s strategy and business plan and contribute to the overall strategy of the unit in close collaboration
with your direct manager
Drive time critical development projects delivering outstanding results
Work collaboratively with other development teams and stakeholders to define priorities, plan projects and ensure milestones are met.
Delivery in time with quality is key.
Build product expertise and technical understanding in the topics under your responsibility
Build bridges between customer requirements and technical feasibility
Spread strong customer centricity across the team, being a role model and showing appreciation and recognition for exceptional
customer focus and success
Support the growth of your people, keeping their skills up-to-date and motivating them by providing challenging opportunities and
perspectives.
Manage Knowledge Retention in the team in a very competitive environment attracting the best talents
Manage and Avoid Customer Escalations in a diplomatic and patient way

 
Work Experience
 
-Work experience at least 10 years in development projects / teams
-People management, project management, and/or technical leadership background is mandatory
-Product and technical expertise in the topics under your responsibility is a plus
- Having experience in application lifecycle management and SAP Solution Manager is a plus.
 
Education and Qualifications / Skills and Competencies
 
-B.S or above in computer science or comparable education
-Strong project management skills with the ability of multi-tasking as the standard mode of operation
-Strong problem resolution skills with good leadership, diplomacy, decision making and analytical skills
-Strong communication and presentation skills
-High customer orientation
-Ability to handle stressful situations
-Be open minded, willing to challenge the status quo and seek for innovative ideas
-Excellency in English, both verbal and written is a must
WHAT YOU GET FROM US
Success is what you make it. At SAP, we help you make it your own. A career at SAP can open many doors for you. If you’re searching for

 a company that’s dedicated to your ideas and individual growth, recognizes you for your unique contributions, fills you with a strong sense
of purpose, and provides a fun, flexible and inclusive work environment – apply now.
SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT 
To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and
appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company.
SAP is committed to the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity and to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with
physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your
application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team
(Americas: Careers.NorthAmerica@sap.com or Careers.LatinAmerica@sap.com, APJ: Careers.APJ@sap.com,
EMEA: Careers@sap.com).
Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.
